1.title: The Case of the Engineer's Thumb

episode of.title: The Elusive Case of the Carrion Fowl (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: Wesley meets Steven and gets sucked into a sordid affair involving the loss of an engineer's thumb.

2.title: Whatever Happened to Wesley?

episode of.title: The Elusive Case of the Carrion Fowl (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: As Wes' infatuation for Cynthia Nixon grows, Steven is left alone to track down Raven's new most brutal leads.

imdb.plot outline: This Mystery TV show is a re-imagining of the classic Sherlock Holmes story, with a few twists. Steven, a consulting detective, comes to Austin penniless, searching for the only criminal that ever escaped him, a criminal mastermind whose only clue is a mysterious mark of the Raven. Steven meets Wesley, an UT undergraduate and Austin native, who offers the detective a place to stay in return for help in searching for his missing father, though this causes friction with Cynthia, Wesley's confident girlfriend. With Wesley's help, Steven solves a series of mysteries that lead him to uncover the secret of the Raven.
imdb.title: The Elusive Case of the Carrion Fowl
akas: The Elusive Case of the Carrion Fowl (United States)
plot: This Mystery TV show is a re-imagining of the classic Sherlock Holmes story, with a few twists. Steven, a consulting detective, comes to Austin penniless, searching for the only criminal that ever escaped him, a criminal mastermind whose only clue is a mysterious mark of the Raven. Steven meets Wesley, an UT undergraduate and Austin native, who offers the detective a place to stay in return for help in searching for his missing father, though this causes friction with Cynthia, Wesley's confident girlfriend. With Wesley's help, Steven solves a series of mysteries that lead him to uncover the secret of the Raven.::BJ Pinedo
